sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, Fragment } from 'react'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { deleteItemFromCartAsync, selectItems, updateCartAsync, } from './cartSlice'; import { Dialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react'; import { XMarkIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Cart() { const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [open, setOpen] = useState(true); const items = useSelector(selectItems); const totalAmount = items.reduce( (amount, item) => item.price * item.quantity + amount, 0 ); const totalItems = items.reduce((total, item) => item.quantity + total, 0); const handleQuantity = (e, item) => { dispatch(updateCartAsync({ ...item, quantity: +e.target.value })); }; const handleRemove =(e, id)=>{ dispatch(deleteItemFromCartAsync(id)) } return ( <>

Cart

    {items.map((item) => (

  • {item.title}

    ${item.price}

    {item.brand}

    • ))}

Subtotal

$ {totalAmount}

Total Items in Cart

{totalItems} items

Shipping and taxes calculated at checkout.

Checkout

or

); }
